channel.title: Guess Who's Back?
channel.description:
Im not actually going anywhere immediately but I unexpectedly soon will be. I don't know if anyone knows this but, Im blind in my left eye and colour blind in my right. With my right eye all I see is the colour yellow (So I have been told) and shades of white (Again so I've been told). I am to get eye surgery and hopefully be able to see the world as everyone else does. Seeing as I live in the US, we really don't have any good eye doctors. So I am going to Germany, over 30 eye doctors and about 40 nurses will be doing the operation. Since it is a major operation, that requires quite a few doctors and nurses, the exact date has not been scheduled. I am told that I will get a notice of only 3 days prior to the operation (The flight will take about 1 day, I am to rest at my hotel for another day) and am not suppose to leave the city. That being said, I might just leave these forums without saying a proper good-bye. Also, with this surgery comes a few risks. The chance of me going completely blind in both eyes is 34.3%, and the chance of me going completely blind in one eye is 48%. As compared to the US, 56.4% and 81.6% respectively. If I go blind, I won't come back to these forums, ever...If I go blind in only one eye, I will come back in a months time. If the operation goes well, I will be back in about 2-3 weeks. Hopefully it will go well. So I ask that all you pray for me that this surgery goes well, you really don't know how depressed I am... So I am saying a early Good-bye, everyone, I really enjoyed my short but loved stay here.
The operation was a part-success! Im partly blind in my left eye and have perfect 20/20 vision in my right eye! The operation was on the 22 and I left early Friday morning, on the 20th. I came back here on the 25th (yesterday) and thought I just drop by here. My last day here was the 19th or so. Anyways I just like to say Thank-you to everyone that encouraged and may god bless your soul. (Yes, I have become pretty religious over the last 7-10 days.) Tbh Im not suppose to be on the computer right now lol, Im suppose to be sleeping. Just thought I'd tell everyone here! ... It's so hard to get away from my mom, Im sure on the plane she memerized the brochure on what and what I can't do/see till im finished with rehab lol. Though I do have to go to rehab and learn all this amazing stuff for 2-3 weeks, I'll try to be on Mopar as much as I can (Which is not a lot lol, rehab is 7:30 AM - 3PM), but after going through a surgery that affected my life greatly, Im not to sure if I want to spend my high school days on a forum, you know? Lol. I think I'll be on for 30-45 minutes then I gotta go sleep, it's hard fighting jetlag lol. --- Thanks again everyone and I appreciate all your encouragement, especially haxxors (Bobby) and Pookey (James). Oh and sorry for writing in colours, just thought I'd fool around with it lol... Edit: Lol I messed up the colour tags :P. [tt][/tt]

item.title: Guess Who's Back?
item.dc:creator: @Taylor Taylor
item.description:
@Taylor wrote:

Here the truth straight from me.

You manage to get to germany and come back in 2 days? impossble, US to Germany takes 18 hours max.

I never believe you in the first place, you tried to get attention. And it works on everyone except jamie, james, and me. I don’t believe anyone over the Internet unless I know them in real life.

If you are rehab you shouldn’t be here for a month or so.

Everyone, feel free to tell the truth as well.

Read full topic

item.title: Guess Who's Back?
item.dc:creator: @irfan786 irfan786
item.description:
@irfan786 wrote:

[quote=“blacker, post:86, topic:20216”]So you like all the new colors you can see. Man, it must have veen pretty dull seeing only white and shades of yellow (or maybe it was the other way arround) Well Im glad you came out ok, but Im sad that it wasnt a complete success.[br][size=1]Posted at: October 28, 2006, 12:46:30 PM[/size][hr][quote author=pko link=topic=30667.msg354910#msg354910 date=1161942178]
i thought u had a dog? mustve been someone else… still. just let this post die, and we can be bf4l. k?
[/quote] Im almost positive it was james.[/quote]

It was a success, just a minor problem that my left eye didn’t get perfect vision :). Anyways Thanks :).

Edit:
Yea, Im sure James would have made a post like that.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @irfan786 irfan786
item.description:
@irfan786 wrote:

Yz85Racer:

irfan. I’m am so happy for you. How do you like the colours? Are you going to have another operation to try and get Full sight back? Or you going to be happy like that and not risk it? I can’t believe you pulled through it. Only someone as mentally tough as you would make it. Well done buddy.

Thanks man
